Html:
I am new to programing.  I have downloaded the March 2009 release to the Program folder.  I have been programming in Visual Basic 2008.  How would I reference the binaries in my project. 


Jim

Hi Jim,

 Hope you don't take this the wrong way, but http://www.amazon.com/Pro-WPF-2008-Presentation-Professionals/dp/1590599551/ref=sr_1_1?ie=UTF8&s=books&qid=1239043615&sr=8-1 this book will give you a lot of insights about .net and WPF.

Regards,
Calin
